remarks: Negation property of the modulo operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2016.)
statement:
modnegd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
modnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
modnegd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
modnegd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) $.
modnegd $p |- ( ph -> ( -u A mod C ) = ( -u B mod C ) ) $.
